mapper.insert: INSERT INTO coupons (couponCode, couponName, description, discountType, discountValue, createdAt, expiryDate, imagename) VALUES (#{couponCode}, #{couponName}, #{description}, #{discountType}, #{discountValue}, NOW(), #{expiryDate}, #{imagename})

insert into couponbox (u_id, couponCode, receivedAt, discountType, discountValue, imagename, expiryDate) values(#{u_id}, #{couponCode}, NOW(), #{discountType}, #{discountValue}, #{imagename}, #{expiryDate})
